lessons.japanese: トムは海岸できれいな貝殻を拾った。
lessons.indonesian: Tom picked up some pretty shells on the beach.

lessons.japanese: 私は岸辺で美しい貝殻を見つけた。
lessons.indonesian: I found a beautiful shell on the shore.

lessons.japanese: 私は岸辺で美しい貝殻を見つけた。
lessons.indonesian: I found a beautiful shell on the shore.

lessons.japanese: あの子は海辺の貝殻売りだ。
lessons.indonesian: She sells seashells by the seashore.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は海辺で貝殻を売っています。
lessons.indonesian: She sells seashells by the seashore.
